name: Investigation Crime Diary
description:
Download amazing and adventure game. This game sets in investigation of crime scene. Your job is to search and find objects and find items to get coins and complete the scene. Would you be able to tackle the puzzle in this hidden object game? Use your eagle eye for this object find quest. Even though this is relaxing game, you’ll find that this hidden object game contains many hidden challenges that you must solve!

There are such huge numbers of clues you need to find before you can complete this hidden object game. This object find game has many scenes. Before you move on to the next scene, you have to complete the previous ones.

The challenge is harder because you only have very limited time to search and find for obj to unlock the secret to the pirate treasure who have hidden it very well deep inside the Crime Area.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
TOP FEATURES OF INVESTIGATION CRIME DIARY
--------------------------------------------------------------------------
• Many scenes with amazing detailed graphic
• Unlock the next scenes after you finish the previous ones
• Zoom out and Zoom In scene
• Two types of hints help to find the clue.
• You need to solve puzzle and clue
• Solve Puzzle with your brain and Catch the killer
• Bring the killer to justice.
• Many types of object to finds.
• Find things within very limited time.
• Many hours of fun and relaxing game sessions

So, what are you waiting for? Are you ready to take the challenge to find things that the crime area have left behind in their hurry to escape.

Download Now...
